notes: TIER 2 research complete for MD and DO. Split-board state. MD: 50 hrs/2yr biennial, all Category 1. 12 hrs pain management (one-time, alternative 8-hr buprenorphine option). MATE Act federal requirement integrated with state pain management CME. DO: 50 hrs/2yr with 20 hrs minimum AOA Category 1A/1B (osteopathic-focused). Same 12-hr pain management requirement. $455 renewal fee (vs MD $1,206). Same birth month renewal, BreEZe system. Comparison table in DO document.
